Package org.catlady.server.game.manager

Class BaseGameManager

java.lang.Object
org.catlady.server.game.manager.BaseGameManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientGameManager, ServerGameManager
public abstract class BaseGameManager extends Object
Defines a general game manager for both client and server.

    • BaseGameManager

      protected BaseGameManager(List<String> playerNames, List<CatCard> strayCats, FoodReserve foodReserve, GameMatrix gameMatrix, int currentPlayer, boolean hasDraw, boolean gameEnd)
      Constructor from scratch, used by deserialization and, as consequence, by ClientGameManager.
      Parameters:
      playerNames - the player names
      strayCats - the stray cats
      foodReserve - the reserve of food
      gameMatrix - the game matrix
      currentPlayer - the current player

      public boolean playerHasDraw()
      check if current player has draw
      Returns:
      true if the current player already drew cards this turn, false otherwise.

    • isValidPlay

      protected boolean isValidPlay(List<Card> cards)
      Defines the possible situation of cards that can be played. May not be enough to verify if some cards can be played or not.
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards to verify if they can be played.
      Returns:
      true if cards are a valid play, false otherwise

    • canPlayCards

      public abstract boolean canPlayCards(List<Card> cards)
      Check if some cards can be played.
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards to check
      Returns:
      true if they can be played, false otherwise

    • isPlayerTurn

      public boolean isPlayerTurn(String player)
      Check if it is a certain player turn
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • isDifferentCatTokenPosition

      public boolean isDifferentCatTokenPosition(RowColumnIdentifier catTokenPosition)
      Verify if the cat token position matches or not the position provided.
      Parameters:
      catTokenPosition - the provided position to check
      Returns:
      true if the position are different, false if they are equal

    • isStrayCatPresent

      public boolean isStrayCatPresent(String strayCatName)
      Verify if a stray cats is present in the stray cat list
      Parameters:
      strayCatName - the name of the stray cat.
      Returns:
      true if the stray cat is present, false otherwise.

    • getStrayCatFromName

      public CatCard getStrayCatFromName(String strayCatName)
      Get a stray cat from its name.
      Parameters:
      strayCatName - the name of the tray cat.
      Returns:
      the stray cat that match the name.
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException - if there are no stray cats with the name provided.

    • removePlayerFromGame

      public void removePlayerFromGame(String player)
      Remove a specific player from the current game.
      Parameters:
      player - the player name inside the lobby.

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      Ends the current player turn.
      Throws:
      IllegalPlayException - when called before the current player has draw cards
